# Welcome --- I'm Timothy Gilbert

*Ecologist ¬∑ Data Designer ¬∑ Conservation Technologist*

Welcome to my digital portfolio! I specialize in building intuitive data workflows that connect field-based ecological expertise with actionable insights --- in both conservation and clinical domains. Whether I'm constructing Shiny dashboards for research teams, modeling nitrate chemistry trends, or automating QA for longitudinal datasets, I aim to make complexity digestible and mission-driven.
